mapper.select: select s.safetystockId,s.productId,s.minamount,s.maxamount,s.sid,s.maxCapacityAmount, s.storeUnit,s.register,s.registertime,s.checker,s.checktime, s.checktag,s.configStatus,s.changeStatus, p.id,p.product_id,p.product_name,h.storeName,h.storeAddress from safetystock s,product p,storehouse h where s.productId=p.product_id and s.sid=h.sid and s.safetystockId=#{safetystockId}
mapper.update: update safetystock set safetystockId=substr(md5(rand()),1,23) where minamount=#{minamount}
mapper.select: select s.*,p.product_id,p.product_name,u.useName,p.product_rank,k.kindName,s.registertime from safetystock s left join product p on s.productId=p.product_id left join product_kind k on p.product_kind_id=k.id left join product_use u on p.use_type=u.id where (s.checktag='等待审核' or changeStatus='已变更' and s.checktag='等待审核')
mapper.update: UPDATE safetystock set checker=#{checker},checktime=now(),checktag='审核通过',configStatus='完成' WHERE safetystockId=#{safetystockId}
mapper.select: select s.id,s.safetystockId,s.productId,s.registertime,p.product_id,p.product_name,s.configStatus,s.checktag from safetystock s,product p where s.productId=p.product_id

select s.id,s.safetystockId,s.productId,p.product_id,p.product_name, p.product_unit,p.REAL_COST_PRICE,u.useName,p.product_rank,k.kindName,s.registertime from safetystock s,product p,product_use u,product_kind k where s.productId=p.product_id and p.use_type=u.id and p.product_kind_id=k.id and s.checktag='审核通过'
mapper.update: update safetystock set minamount=#{minamount},maxamount=#{maxamount},maxCapacityAmount=#{maxCapacityAmount}, storeUnit=#{storeUnit},register=#{register},checker=#{checker},checktag='等待审核',configStatus='未完成',changeStatus='已变更' where safetystockId=#{safetystockId}
